name: Til Death Do Us Part: Our Love is Electric
name_original: Til Death Do Us Part: Our Love is Electric
description:
The day has finally arrived! The wedding day you've always dreamed of ... too bad a zombie outbreak happened at the same time!!

Fortunately, sparks are flying between you and your SO, and your connection is unbreakable.

Control these spouses and use their connection to beat back the zombie menace!

{Gamepad Recommended]

Controls: Gamepad
- L/R stick - Move
- LB/RB - Action Buttons

Controls: Keyboard
- WASD/Arrows - Move
- E/Num 0 - Action Buttons

With love on your side, these monsters don't stand a chance!
